headline.main: JUNGLE BASE FALLS; Allies Pursue Japanese Eastward on Trail in New Guinea

lead_paragraph: AT UNITED NATION'S HEADQUARTERS, Australia, Tuesday, Nov. 3--Allied ground forces have recaptured Kokoda, chief inland base of the Japanese in New Guinea, and frustrated a Japanese attempt to land strong reinforcements at Buna, the strategic coastal base sixty miles east of Kokoda, General Douglas MacArthur's command announced today.
abstract: US forces take offensive, Guadalcanal; cross Matanikau River; push Jap troops back; map
